DOC.brief_title: Standard Corneal Collagen Crosslinking Versus Transepithelial Corneal Crosslinking Iontophoresis Riboflavin
DOC.criteria: Documented progressive KC ( Pentacam and/or corneal topography imaging ) . A clear central cornea . A minimal corneal thickness ≥ 400 µm thinnest corneal location ( Pentacam image ) . Minimal Snellen correct distance visual acuity ≥ 0.4 . Patient age ≥ 18 year . Corneal scar . History epithelial healing problem . History presence ocular infection ( herpes keratitis ) Pregnancy and/or breastfeeding .
